mapper.select: SELECT employee_no employeeNo , employee_pw employeePw , employee_name employeeName , employee_gender employeeGender , employee_birth employeeBirth , address_no addressNo , employee_phone employeePhone , employee_department employeeDepartment , employee_position employeePosition , photo_file_no photoFileNo , stamp_file_no stampFileNo , employee_mail employeeMail , employee_date employeeDate , create_date createDate , update_date updateDate FROM employee
